activities: PubMatic aids online publisher customers in optimizing their ad inventory and earning the highest revenue possible for the sale of that inventory. We collect (a) personal information from our publisher clients’ consumers located in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland, to the extent shared with us by our publisher clients, (b) personal information from individuals who visit our corporate website or use our client portals and provide personal information during such visits, and (c) personal information from employee candidates and employees hired from within the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland. With respect to the information described in (a) above, PubMatic is not the data controller; our publisher clients are the controllers. PubMatic is a data processor acting on behalf of such publisher clients. PubMatic may transmit such information to our data centers in the U.S. for processing on behalf of our clients, in order to help them optimize their ad inventory. PubMatic is the data controller with respect to the information described in (b) and (c) above, which may be transmitted to or accessed from our offices in the US, India, EU, Japan, Singapore and Australia. We process the information described in (b) to provide services to our potential customers and site users, including marketing and support services. We process the information described in (c) for human resource, payroll and business reasons.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, client, customer, visitor, user data
recoursemech: PubMatic has agreed to cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs), as well as the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland; nevertheless, disputes should first be raised to the attention of the PubMatic contact person listed above.
